forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.
